binaryOption.name: EnableFifo
binaryOption.toolTip: This option enables use of the receive FIFO in addition to the individual mailboxes.\n The maximum number of individual mailboxes is reduced.

intOption.name: MaxNumberOfMessageBuffers
intOption.description: Maximum number of message buffers available
intOption.toolTip: This is the maximum value determined by the hardware.\n The CAN memory is shared between the FIFO filters and message buffers so\n the actual number available will be reduced by use of the FIFO and FIFO filters

intOption.name: MaxNumberOfFifoMessageFilters
intOption.description: Maximum number of FIFO message filters available
intOption.toolTip: This is the maximum value determined by the hardware.\n The CAN memory is shared between the FIFO filters and message buffers\n so a usable number will be less than this.

intOption.name: NumberOfFifoMessageFilters
intOption.toolTip: Used to configure number of FIFO filters

intOption.name: NumberOfIndividualMailboxes
intOption.toolTip: Used to configure number individually allocated mailboxes
